mapper.select: SELECT q.id AS id, q.subject AS subject, q.req_type AS req_type, q.answer_status AS answer_status, q.answer_id AS answer_id, DATE_FORMAT(q.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, m.name AS request_name FROM qna q INNER JOIN member m ON q.request_id=m.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{listCount}

SELECT q.id AS id, q.subject AS subject, q.content AS content, q.req_type AS req_type, q.answer AS answer, q.answer_status AS answer_status, DATE_FORMAT(q.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(q.edit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS edit_date, q.request_id AS request_id, m.name AS request_name, q.answer_id AS answer_id
, m1.name AS answer_name
FROM qna q INNER JOIN member m ON q.request_id=m.id
INNER JOIN member m1 ON q.answer_id=m1.id
WHERE q.id=#{id}
SELECT answer_status FROM qna WHERE id=#{id}
